property.name: displayVariant
property.label: Display Option
property.description: Select the default format of the card. Options are: None (flat) or Featured (drop shadow), Outline (flat with border).

property.name: showViewSelector
property.label: Show View Selector
property.description: Allow users to select between vertical (card) and horizontal (list) view.

property.name: showTable
property.label: Show Table View
property.description: Allow users to show table view.

property.name: showList
property.label: Show List View
property.description: Allow users to show list view.

property.name: showCard
property.label: Show Card View
property.description: Allow users to show card view.

property.name: sortVariant
property.label: Sort Label Variant
property.description: Select the sort option label appearance.

property.name: listId
property.label: List Id
property.description: Unique ID for the list results. Allows multiple list components to exist on a page. This property relates the filter component to a specific list.
